questions.question: What are the seven characteristics of life?
options: All of the above are characteristics of life
questions.explanation: All living organisms share seven characteristics: Organization, Metabolism, Homeostasis, Growth and Development, Reproduction, Response to Stimuli, and Evolution.

questions.question: Describe the levels of biological organization from smallest to largest.
questions.placeholder: Start with atoms and molecules, then progress through cells, tissues, organs...

questions.question: Cells are the fundamental unit of life.
questions.explanation: Cells are indeed the basic unit of life. All living organisms are composed of one or more cells.

questions.question: Which of the following is the correct order of the scientific method?
options: Observation, Question, Hypothesis, Experiment, Analysis, Conclusion
questions.explanation: The scientific method follows this sequence: Observation → Question → Hypothesis → Experiment → Analysis → Conclusion.
